short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save you from re-ticking the T&C every time you load Connect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you use Connect from the Department of Education in Western Australia?

Do you get annoyed having to tick "Agree to terms and conditions EVERY SINGLE TIME"? 

Well no more! With this handy extension, you agree by clicking log in. One less thing to do in your day.
